content.raw: We will make an install tutorial in the ROS integration section.
content.html: We will make an install tutorial in the ROS integration section.

content.raw: We have no mention that installing gazebo in MacOSX can only be done using homebrew. It is the only option for that platform but it is under the section "Installing from source".
content.html: We have no mention that installing gazebo in MacOSX can only be done using homebrew. It is the only option for that platform but it is under the section "Installing from source".

content.raw: I believe that a good part of the people that use the install page is looking for Gazebo integration with ROS. In the current document, at the beginning, there is a note about installing gazebo with ROS [pointing to the wiki page about this](http://gazebosim.org/wiki/Install/Gazebo_and_ROS). Maybe is a good idea to keep something visible for ROS users.
content.html: I believe that a good part of the people that use the install page is looking for Gazebo integration with ROS. In the current document, at the beginning, there is a note about installing gazebo with ROS pointing to the wiki page about this. Maybe is a good idea to keep something visible for ROS users.

content.html: fuerte and groovy are now deprecated. We could just leave hydro and indigo.

content.raw: We can not use the generic libgazebo-dev for gazebo4 since is already in use for gazebo3 in our repository. We will use libgazebo4-dev.
content.html: We can not use the generic libgazebo-dev for gazebo4 since is already in use for gazebo3 in our repository. We will use libgazebo4-dev.
